kpi_info.title: SCTP_IN_PACKET_DISCARDS
kpi_info.use: The number of SCTP packets has been discarded for various reasons, such as invalid checksums, length, stale cookie, and use of multicast/broadcast addresses. UPDATED: When an SCTP packet has been discarded for various reasons, such as invalid checksums, length, stale cookie, and use of multicast/broadcast addresses.
